Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Major
b) Defect Observed: Brake system pressure decay. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Manufacturing defect in material composition leading to premature failure
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Flight Control Hydraulics component.
Analysis of operational data indicated parameter deviation.
c) Remedial Measures Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Modify design to incorporate additional safety margin
d) Attributable Code: N1 - Defect confirmed but reason not established
Remarks: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings.
Date: 08/07/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. T.R. Menon
